message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.RO, cs.CG 

This paper deals with the problem of performance capture from multi-view video, which involves computer vision and graphics techniques. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also deals with surface reconstruction and optimization, which are related to computer graphics, making cs.GR (Graphics) another likely category. The use of Gaussian functions and optimization techniques suggest that the paper could also belong to cs.MM (Multimedia), while the use of implicit representations and occlusion handling suggest that it could belong to cs.RO (Robotics and Control). Finally, the paper deals with fine-scale surface detail, which could also make it relevant to cs.CG (Computational Geometry).
